name: Henry Jonathan "Hank" Pym
notes: Merged with Ultron in Rage of Ultron Vol. 1. A funeral was held.

name: Janet van Dyne
notes: Dies in Secret Invasion V1:I8. Actually was sent tto Microverse later recovered

name: Anthony Edward "Tony" Stark
notes: Death: "Later while under the influence of Immortus Stark committed a number of horrible acts and was killed.'  This set up young Tony. Franklin Richards later brought him back

name: Robert Bruce Banner
notes: Dies in Ghosts of the Future arc. However "he had actually used a hidden Pantheon base to survive"

name: Thor Odinson
notes: Dies in Fear Itself brought back because that's kind of the whole point. Second death in Time Runs Out has not yet returned

name: Steven Rogers
notes: Dies at the end of Civil War. Later comes back.

name: Clinton Francis Barton
notes: Dies in exploding Kree ship in Averngers Vol. 1  Issue 502. Brought back by Scarlet Witch. Dies again in House of M Vol 1 Issue 7. Is later brought back.

name: Pietro Maximoff
notes: Dies in House of M Vol 1 Issue 7. Later comes back

name: Jacques Duquesne

name: Victor Shade (alias)

name: Natalia Alianovna Romanova

name: Brandt
notes: Dies in Silver_Surfer_Vol_3_3. Actually "fragments of her essence were spread out all across the universe"

name: Heather Douglas
notes: Dies in Defenders_Vol_1_152. Later 'Obtained a new body.' Dies in Annihilation:_Conquest_Vol_1_3. Comes back as "As before" also was once named Madame MacEvil because LOL.

name: Patsy Walker
notes: Died during time on Defenders. Eventually ressurected by villian Grim Reaper along with Mockingbird to fight the Avengers.

name: Matthew Liebowitz (birth name)
notes: Died during Return_to_the_Old_West. Resurrected by She Hulk in negotiation with Time Variance Authority. As a time traveller he died in 1938. Did not return

name: Robert L. Frank Sr.
notes: Died in Vision_and_the_Scarlet_Witch_Vol_1_2. Did not return however he was eventually cloned but the clone was killed immediately.

name: Simon Williams
notes: Died in Avengers_Vol_1_9. Actually just in a death-like coma.

name: Mar-Vell
notes: The bad penny of the Marvel universe. First killed in Secret invasion. Revived during the Chaos war. Died again during aformentioned chaos war. Resurrected by the Kree Empire using theï¿½M'Kraan Crystal. Third death during Avengers vs. X-Men. Has not return

name: Jocasta

name: Jennifer Walters
notes: Dies during Red Hulk Saga. Returns when Lyra infiltrates Intelligenica and finds her in statis

name: Barbara Barton (nee Morse)
notes: Killed by Mephisto. After Secret Invasion it turns out she was actually being impersonated by a Skrull the whole time and was alive and well.

name: Moira Brandon
notes: Died in her second appearance earns honorary Avengers status doing so. Stays dead.

name: Benjamin Jacob Grimm
notes: Once killed during a battle with Doctor Doom.' Brought back by the FF when they literally went to Heaven to get him.

name: Marc Spector
notes: NA but he he did die and return to get his powers prior to joining the Avengers.

name: Jim Hammond (alias)
notes: Dies during New Invaders. Was "was revived as a living weapon the Thinker intended to sell." Prior to joining the avengers he had died like 2 times in the 40s.

name: Miguel Santos
notes: NA: Has not died since joing the Avengers but prior to joining he fought the West Coast avengers and seemingly died. Later turned up under control of a villain

name: X-51
notes: Died in Deathlok Vol 2 #5. JK that was actually just a Life Model Decoy

name: Namor McKenzie
notes: Namor was presumed killed in the battle with Atlantean Barbarians. Had actually survived and turned up in the South Pacific

name: Scott Edward Harris Lang
notes: Died in Avengers:_Disassembled. Was brought back in the Young Avengers: Children's Crusade arc because time travel but take my word for it it was actually kind of well done.

name: Anthony Ludgate Druid
notes: Shot with a Breathing gun and corpse dumped in trash. Revived by the Grim Reaper. Helped Avengers defeat the Reaper so his spirit could remain at peace. Later completely revived by the Chaos King.

name: Marrina Smallwood
notes: Killed by Namor with the Ebony Blade. Returned when The Master put her in a statis tube. Death 2 was when Namor mercy killed her. Returned to life a second time by the Chaos King.

name: Ravonna Lexus Renslayer
notes: Killed in Avengers_Vol_1_24. Revived by the Grandmaster. Died in Avengers:_Forever_Vol_1_3.

name: Rita DeMara
notes: Killed by Iron Man when he was controlled by Immortus. Revived during Chaos war.

name: Dennis Dunphy
notes: Died in Captain_America_348. Actually "Dunphy miraculously survived the crash and lived with an Inuit tribe." Second death when killed by Sharon Carter.

name: Gilgamesh
notes: Killed by Neut who was working for Immortus. Reborn into a new body.

name: Wendell Elvis Vaughn
notes: Killed by the Cosmic Assassin. Actually turned into a being composed of pure energy.

name: Dinah Soar
notes: Died in Great_Lakes_Avengers_Vol_1_1. Has not returned

name: DeMarr Davis
notes: Sacrificed self so that Mr. Immortal could stop the villain Maelstrom. Returned as the Angel of Death.

name: Craig Hollis
notes: Christ; where to begin. His superpower is that he cannot die when he dies he immediately comes back. The Wikia inventories 24 deaths. These will be excluded from the analysis.

name: Monkey Joe
notes: Killed by Leather Boy

name: Doug Taggert
notes: Accidently killed by Zaran

name: Wade Wilson
notes: Died during incursion. It's not ever particulalry clear if he ever joined an Avengers team besides one issue so his inclusion here is specious at best.

name: Greg Willis
notes: Died on Battleworld and came back prior to joining avengers

name: Peter Benjamin Parker
notes: Since joining the New Avengers: First death Killed by Morlun. Ressurected in a brand new body. Died in Amazing Spider-Man #700. Eventually mainfested in his body that Octavious stole and then took over again.

name: William Baker
notes: Died in Identity_Disc_Vol_1_1. Later was revealed to be alive and working along with the Vulture.

name: Eric Kevin Masterson
notes: Became posessed died to purge self of corruption. Revived as undead Avenger minion of the Grim Reaper. Returned to the spirit world by the Scarlet Witch. Has since stayed dead.

name: Deathcry
notes: Reduced her to a pile of bones and organsby Vargas. Brought back by Chaos King. Died second time in Chaos_War:_Dead_Avengers_Vol_1_3

name: Anthony Edward Stark
notes: Merged with 616 Tony Stark

name: "Giulietta Nefaria"
notes: Whitney killed was a clone possibly this incarnation of Masque'

name: Jonathan Hart

name: Veranke
notes: Killed by Norman Osbourne. Has not returned.

name: James "Logan" Howlett

name: Robert Reynolds

name: Maya Lopez
notes: First death 'had been murdered in a fight with Elektra.' "Revived by Elektra and the Hand with their dark magic." Died in most recent run of Moon Knight has not yet returned.

name: Nathaniel Richards
notes: NA is actually Kang but let's just not go there.

name: Alias: Jonas

name: Sharon Carter
